command: dism /Mount-Wim /WimFile:C:\Images\install.wim /Index:1 /MountDir:C:\Mount\Install; dism /Image:C:\Mount\Install /Enable-Feature /FeatureName:TelnetClient /All; dism /Unmount-Wim /MountDir:C:\Mount\Install /Commit; Get-FileHash C:\Images\install.wim -Algorithm SHA256; fc /b C:\Images\install_clean.wim C:\Images\install.wim
explanation: Modifies the offline system image by enabling an OS feature and then verifies the resulting image integrity against a baseline, consistent with image patching behavior.
rationale_steps: Mount the target WIM for servicing with administrative privileges.
Enable a feature offline to alter the system image state.
Commit changes to bake the modification into the image.
Confirm the image differs from the baseline via hash and fc.
